Articles.Content:
Hey does anyone know what is causing this to happen? 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx2wRQ9mF1AINVE3S1lZbk56bFE/view?usp=sharing

Sorry I don't know how to upload a picture here :-P
Without a craft file to test, it's hard to say for sure... but I've seen it before, and in that case it was caused by struts without endpoints.

2 hours ago, beta546 said:

Hey does anyone know what is causing this to happen? 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx2wRQ9mF1AINVE3S1lZbk56bFE/view?usp=sharing

Sorry I don't know how to upload a picture here :-P

Somebody recently brought this to me and before I could help, they determined it was strict causing the issue. Much like the thread posted above.

Ahhh well thank you guys. That would explain why it only seems to happen with ships I have downloaded now I think about it. As I never use struts. Thank you again both of you. I can turn my aero effects back up now as I had to set it on minimal to stop it. Now I can just remove struts from any crafts I download :-)
